Content:
Hello,

I am getting close to finished on my 1978 XL125 project. When I bought this bike it was in pieces mixed with the parts from a 1982 CX500. Among other parts, the bike was missing the seat and exhaust. I got it running for the first time today! Anyhow, I need a muffler and can't find a stock one that isn't rusted out. Can anyone provide advice on a suitable muffler for this little bike? Here is a pic of the bike. I have the header pipe. Just need the rest.

Thanks.
